newsitem.title: USA: News Corp names Sherak to head division.
newsitem.headline: News Corp names Sherak to head division.

text.p: News Corp Ltd's Fox Filmed Entertainment said Tom Sherak was named chairman of 20th Domestic Film Group, a newly formed division of Fox Filmed Entertainment.
In addition, Sherak will retain his title of senior executive vice president, Fox Filmed Entertainment, solidifying his ranking as the number-three executive.

Sherak has served as senior executive vice president of Fox Filmed Entertainment since the division was formed in December of 1994. Prior to that time, he was senior executive vice president of Twentieth Century Fox since March 1994.
